jobs.title: Internship for Project Management
jobs.location: 1-40-1, Menara Bangkok bank, berjaya central park, no 105 jalan ampang, 50450 kuala lumpur
description: Ensure meeting the deadlines and timely tasks of all project deliverables
Play an active role in effective problem-solving and good decision-making in delivery of project outcomes
requirements: Minimum 3 months traineeship period and final year student is preferred.
Strong passion with minimum relevant technical skills in the respective positions above
Strong analytic and problem solving skills
Good Interpersonal skills with colleagues and supervisors

jobs.title: internship for programmer
jobs.location: 1-40-1, Menara Bangkok bank, berjaya central park, no 105 jalan ampang, 50450 kuala lumpur
description: Assist in developing and maintaining mobile applications for [iOS/Android/both] platforms.
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, developers, and product managers, to implement new features.
Test applications for usability, performance, and reliability, and troubleshoot bugs.
Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in mobile development.
Contribute to technical documentation and project planning.
requirements: Minimum 3 months traineeship period and final year student is preferred.
Strong passion with minimum relevant technical skills in the respective positions above
Strong analytic and problem solving skills
Good Interpersonal skills with colleagues and supervisors
